mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board_template bt JOIN (SELECT bt2.id FROM board_template bt2 WHERE bt2.is_use = 1 AND bt2.member_pk = #{memberPk}) bt3 ON bt.id = bt3.id;
SELECT * FROM board_template bt WHERE bt.id = #{id} AND bt.is_use = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_template (name, content, create_at, update_at , member_pk, is_public, members_only) VALUES (#{name}, #{content, typeHandler=JsonObjectTypeHandler}, #{createAt}, #{updateAt} , #{memberPk}, #{isPublic}, #{membersOnly})
mapper.update:
UPDATE board_template bt
bt.name = #{name},
bt.content = #{content, typeHandler=JsonObjectTypeHandler},
bt.update_at = #{updateAt},
bt.is_public = #{isPublic},
bt.members_only = #{membersOnly},
WHERE bt.id = #{id}
